description:
A simple solution for weekend markets and daily commutes. There's plenty of room, and great for short trips where on/off speed is less of a concern. Twin design has a handle so it's easy to carry.

  • Oceanweave® fabric made with reclaimed fishnets
  • Water-resistant stitching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry
  • Internal backboard keeps the pannier's shape
  • Velcro mounting straps and bungee hooks fit almost any rack
  • Reflective accents and light loops on both sides
name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave P25 Twin Panniers
